rules.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Prospecting")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Prospecting & Qualification" )),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Business Needs Discovery")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Customer Requirements Gathering")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Technical Feasibility")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Solution Design")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Revenue Validation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Solution Design")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Preparation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Validation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Submission")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Commitment")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Review")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Acceptance")),TRUE, FALSE)))))))))))))))

rules.description: If an Opportunity is Open and not Close-Won, Fill out this field with the Close Date field If an Opportunity is Closed Won, Fill this field with the Estimated Bill Date If an Opportunity is fully Billed, Populate the Actual Bill Date on the Opp, and
rules.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Prospecting")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Prospecting & Qualification" )),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Business Needs Discovery")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Customer Requirements Gathering")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Technical Feasibility")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Solution Design")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Revenue Validation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Solution Design")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Preparation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Validation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Submission")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Commitment")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Lead")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Review")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Acceptance")),TRUE, FALSE))))))))))))))))

rules.description: Using the contract start date and term to calculate end date

This WF rule and supporting field were created because we changed the forecast category for Closed Won to be a pipeline stage thus making the existing "Won" checkbox invalid. This rule was created to report on Win Rate % in SFDC

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Custom Won Checkbox Uncheck
rules.description: This WF rule and supporting field were created because we changed the forecast category for Closed Won to be a pipeline stage thus making the existing "Won" checkbox invalid. This rule was created to report on Win Rate % in SFDC

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Lead Stage if Opp is New

criteriaItems.value: Digicel Business Opportunity,IDOM IO ICT,IDOM FWI ICT

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Lost from Closed Won Checkbox Update
rules.description: This rule was created to automate the reporting of Opportunities that were at the "Closed Won" Stage and have been Closed Lost.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"))

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Lost from Prospecting Checkbox Update
rules.description: This rule was created to automate the reporting of Opportunities that were at the "Prospecting & Qualification" Stage and have been Closed Lost.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "Prospecting & Qualification"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"))

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Opportunity Stage Date Change
rules.description: This work rule enforced the Opportunity stage date to chance once the Opportunity stage has changed
rules.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Prospecting")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Prospecting & Qualification" )),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Business Needs Discovery")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Customer Requirements Gathering")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Technical Feasibility")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Solution Design")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Revenue Validation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Solution Design")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Preparation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Validation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Submission")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Commitment")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Review")),TRUE, IF((ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Acceptance")),TRUE, FALSE)))))))))))))))

rules.description: Increment the Push Counter field by 1
rules.formula: IF( CloseDate > PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ), IF (MONTH(CloseDate) <> MONTH(PRIORVALUE( CloseDate )) , TRUE, FALSE), FALSE)

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Reset Cloned Opportunities - Business
rules.description: This applies to all countries. When an opportunity is cloned, the stage will be reset to "Prospecting and Qualification" and the "Revenue Validated and Approved" checkbox to FALSE

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Track Opportunity Stage %26 Duration
Sales Ops%3A Update Close Date on Lost Opportunities
rules.description: Updates the Close date to today when Opportunities are closed lost

criteriaItems.value: Digicel Business Opportunity,IDOM IO ICT,IDOM FWI ICT

rules.description:
Updates the Close date to today when Opportunities are closed won.

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Update State Field on Acc to Active When Opp Billed
rules.description: Updates the "State" Field on the account to "Active" when an opportunity is Billed in last 12 months

rules.fullName: Sales Ops%3A Update Type Field on Acc to Customer When Opp Billed
rules.description: Updates the "Type" Field on the account to "Customer" when an opportunity is changed to Billed

rules.fullName: TREND%3A Lost from Prospecting Checkbox Update
rules.description: This rule was created to automate the reporting of Opportunities that were at the "Prospecting" Stage and have been Closed Lost.
